cause.description:
In today's society it is more important than ever for children, teens and adults to work for and help themselves. Allowing opportunities for practice in the home, in public, and in the classroom for children to will ensure independence in the future. With your help we can make this happen.
1. Individual independence
2. Safety
3. Confidence
cause.mission: help children and teens become more independent by advocating for theirselves.
cause.name: Self Advocacy for Children with Disabilities
